data.title: Liesel Matthews
data.text:
At Writers Theatre: Hamlet,The Father

Chicago credits include: Lily in Waving Goodbye (Naked Eye and Steppenwolf Theatre Companies), Sally in House and Garden (Goodman Theater, dir. Robert Falls) and Morse in One Flea Spare (Naked Eye). Broadway credits include Anna in Vincent in Brixton (dir. Richard Eyre). London credits include: Jenn in The Distance from Here (Almeida Theatre, dir. David Leveaux). Film credits include: Air Force One (dir. Wolfgang Petersen) and A Little Princess (dir. Alfonso Cuaron). Liesel is the co-founder of the Blue Haven Initiative, which is focused on impact investing, and the IDP Foundation, Inc., which focuses on international education projects. Love to Ian.

[Bio as of August 2012]
